tools.title: FutureFunds Portfolio Management System
tools.subtitle: Build, track, and iterate AI-driven strategies end-to-end
description: A rules-first portfolio OS: screeners, backtests, rebalancing, and performance exports.
Designed around Google Sheets + AI prompts so you can audit every decision.
Roadmap: live broker sync, rule diffing, and multi-strategy dashboards.
notes: Full holdings & charts are gated for supporters while in beta.
Includes priority access to new strategies.

tools.title: StockAlpha.ai — Investment Journal
tools.subtitle: A Journalytics-style journal: self-assess, tag biases, and follow through
description: Structured entries for theses, catalysts, checklists, confidence, and post-mortems.
Behavior analytics to surface patterns (premature sells, size errors, FOMO, etc.).
Private by default. Export to CSV/Sheets.
notes: Early preview will open as a free web app; accounts optional.

tools.title: ValueBot.ai — Valuation Tool
tools.subtitle: Pick a strategy and get a sourced, step-by-step valuation
description: Modular prompts execute your chosen framework (e.g., Quality, Deep Value, Momentum blend).
Outputs: fair value range, key drivers, red-flag checklist, and sensitivity table.
Designed to run on your data sources (Sheets / APIs).
notes: License includes 1 year of updates; patrons get discounts.
